title: i cre every time
body:
Pc craps itself tries to rejoin quickly game just remade gg 5 20min timers 
right after i finished my last set too (that was again due to some unfortunate timing )
I really want to cre 
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: And if you keep going without fixing what causes your "unfortunate" accidents you'll end up getting permabanned.
I don't think you can get permabanned for dodging or leaving games. In the faq I read, leaver buster never leads to bans.
